TypeSignature.Value: public class DataGridViewColumn : System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand, IDisposable, System.ComponentModel.IComponent
.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridViewColumn extends System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand implements class System.ComponentModel.IComponent, class System.IDisposable
Public Class DataGridViewColumn Inherits DataGridViewBand Implements IComponent, IDisposable
public ref class DataGridViewColumn : System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewBand, IDisposable, System::ComponentModel::IComponent

summary.span: 表示 控件中的列。

span.span: Represents a column in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示中的逻辑列控件。The class represents a logical column in a control. 你可以检索通过列在控件集合。You can retrieve columns through the collection of the control. 与不同，其中包含中的单元格的实际集合，主要用于调整的外观和行为的列的用户界面 (UI)，如列宽度和单元格样式。Unlike a , which contains the actual collection of cells in a , is used mainly to adjust the appearance and behavior of the column user interface (UI), such as column width and cell style. 单元格样式有关的详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的单元格样式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about cell styles, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 派生自的类型通常初始化相关类型的新实例属性派生自类。Types that derive from typically initialize the property to a new instance of a related type derived from the class. 与的外观或行为各个单元格的任何列属性是模板单元格的相应属性的包装。Any column properties that relate to the appearance or behavior of individual cells are wrappers for the corresponding properties of the template cell. 自动更改的列上的这些属性之一更改单元格模板以及列中的所有单元格的值。Changing one of these properties on the column automatically changes the value on the cell template and on all cells in the column. 若要替代各个单元格的指定的值，请设置该列的值后设置单元格的值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建使用 Windows 窗体和一组按钮。The following code example creates a Windows Form with a and a set of buttons. 每个按钮标签都描述与相关的操作属性，如交换的第一个和最后一列 (使用属性) 或更改列标题的文本 (使用属性)。Each button label describes an operation related to a property, such as swapping the first and last column (using the property) or changing the text of a column header (using the property). 单击一个按钮将更改的关联的属性。Clicking a button changes the associated property of the . [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#100](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CPP/DataGridViewColumnDemo.cpp#100)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#100](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CS/DataGridViewColumnDemo.cs#100)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#100](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/VB/datagridviewcolumndemo.vb#100)]

para.span: 派生自并将新属性添加到派生的类，请确保重写方法以在克隆操作过程中复制新属性。

span.span: When you derive from and add new properties to the derived class, be sure to override the method to copy the new properties during cloning operations.

para.span: 你还应调用基类的方法，以便基类的属性复制到新的单元格。

span.span: You should also call the base class's method so that the properties of the base class are copied to the new cell.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode AutoSizeMode { System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置模式，通过此模式列可以自动调整其宽度。

span.span: Gets or sets the mode by which the column automatically adjusts its width.

value.span: 值确定该列是否将自动调整其宽度，以及该列将如何确定首选宽度。

span.span: A value that determines whether the column will automatically adjust its width and how it will determine its preferred width.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值确定列的自动调整大小行为属性，它是值相同的除外的所有值的属性，这指示值是否从继承属性改为。The automatic sizing behavior of the column is determined by the value of the property, which is the same as the value of the property for all values except , which indicates that the value is inherited from the property instead. 当属性值是，以及在该模式下的其他列调整列的大小。When the property value is , the column is resized along with other columns in that mode. 控件中的所有填充模式列都划分可用空间按比例由其属性值。All fill-mode columns in the control divide the available space in proportions determined by their property values. 通过减去从控件的客户端区域的宽度的所有其他列的宽度确定可用于填充模式的宽度。The width available for fill mode is determined by subtracting the widths of all other columns from the width of the client area of the control. 如果此宽度小于组合所有填充模式列的值，显示水平滚动条，所有填充模式列在都显示时带有最小宽度，并且用户列调整大小时被禁用。If this width is smaller than the combined values of all fill-mode columns, the horizontal scroll bar is displayed, all fill-mode columns are shown with their minimum widths, and user column-resizing is disabled. 有关列填充模式的详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的列填充模式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/column-fill-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about column fill mode, see [Column Fill Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/column-fill-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 当属性设置为以外的任何其他值，该列将管理其宽度，以便其单元格的值完全显示会不经剪辑。When the property is set to any other value except , the column will manage its width so that its cell values are fully displayed without clipping. 在基于内容的大小调整模式下，大小调整单元格内容更改时，或者会发生，一旦启用，每当更改行高。In content-based sizing modes, size adjustments occur whenever cell contents change or, if is enabled, whenever row heights change. 某些基于内容的大小调整模式，可以限制对当前显示的行大小调整，以提高性能。Some content-based sizing modes let you limit the size adjustment to the currently displayed rows in order to increase performance. 只有具有列属性值`true`调整大小时，更改列的可见性不会导致进行调整大小时发生。Only columns with a property value of `true` are resized, and changing the visibility of a column does not cause resizing to occur. 此外，在列设置为自动调整大小，则用户不能调整鼠标列宽度。Additionally, when columns are set to automatically resize, the user cannot adjust the column widths with the mouse. 若要以编程方式调整列宽，使用控件的或方法或设置列属性。To adjust column widths programmatically, use the control's or methods or set the column property. 有关基于内容的自动调整大小的详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中调整选项](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about content-based automatic sizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例强制列自动重新调整其宽度以适应其内容。The following code example forces a column to automatically resize its width to fit its contents. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#109](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CPP/DataGridViewColumnDemo.cpp#109)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#109](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CS/DataGridViewColumnDemo.cs#109)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#109](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/VB/datagridviewcolumndemo.vb#109)]

span.span: The specified value when setting this property results in an value of for a visible column that is frozen.

summary.span: 获取或设置用于创建新单元格的模板。

span.span: Gets or sets the template used to create new cells.

value.span: 一个 ，列中的所有其他单元格都以它为模型。

span.span: A that all other cells in the column are modeled after.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数类初始化此属性。The constructors for the class initialize this property. 默认构造函数将属性设置为`null`; 另一个构造函数将从其参数复制单元格模板。The default constructor sets the property to `null`; the other constructor copies the cell template from its parameter. > [!NOTE] > 更改单元格模板的属性不会立即影响列的现有单元格的用户的界面 (UI)。Changing the properties of the cell template will not immediately affect the user interface (UI) of the column's existing cells. 重新生成列后，这些更改才明显 (例如，通过对列进行排序或通过调用方法)。These changes are only apparent after the column is regenerated (for example, by sorting the column or through a call to the method). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用为模板，供。The following code example demonstrates how to use a as a template for a . 对列中的任意单元格所做的样式更改会影响所有列的单元格。Style changes made to any cell in the column affect all of the column's cells. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#120](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CPP/DataGridViewColumnDemo.cpp#120)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#120](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CS/DataGridViewColumnDemo.cs#120)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#120](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/VB/datagridviewcolumndemo.vb#120)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户单击列的显示区域中的鼠标右键按钮时，将出现快捷菜单。The shortcut menu appears when a user clicks the right mouse button in the column's display area. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性以添加用于更改单元格的背景色的功能。The following code example uses the property to add functionality for changing a cell's background color. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#130](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CPP/DataGridViewColumnDemo.cpp#130)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#130](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CS/DataGridViewColumnDemo.cs#130)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#130](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/VB/datagridviewcolumndemo.vb#130)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DataPropertyName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置数据源属性的名称或与 绑定的数据库列的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the data source property or database column to which the is bound.

value.span: 与 关联的属性或数据库列的不区分大小写的名称。

span.span: The case-insensitive name of the property or database column associated with the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性设置为`true`，每个列将自动设置其属性中指定的数据源的属性或数据库列的名称属性。When the property is set to `true`, each column automatically sets its property to the name of a property or database column in the data source specified by the property. 此绑定也可以手动，这在你想要在数据源中显示的属性或可用的数据库列的一个子集时很有用。This binding can also be performed manually, which is useful when you want to display only a subset of the properties or database columns available in the data source. 在这种情况下，设置属性`false`，然后手动将每个添加，设置每个值属性的属性或你想要显示数据源中的数据库列。In such cases, set the property to `false`, and then manually add each , setting the value of each property to the properties or database columns in the data source that you want to display. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何选择每一列将表示哪些属性。The following code example shows how to choose what property each column will represent. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._CollectionBound#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._CollectionBound/CS/collectionbound.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._CollectionBound#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._CollectionBound/VB/collectionbound.vb#20)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._CollectionBound#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._CollectionBound/CS/collectionbound.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._CollectionBound#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._CollectionBound/VB/collectionbound.vb#10)]

summary.span: 获取或设置列的默认单元格样式。

span.span: Gets or sets the column's default cell style.

value.span: ，表示该列中单元格的默认样式。

span.span: A that represents the default style of the cells in the column.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件将显示其使用指示的单元格的样式的单元格属性，该类继承自其他类型的属性的样式。The control displays its cells using the styles indicated by the cell property, which inherits styles from other properties of type . 通过指定的样式对于此列中的单元格，属性重写通过指定的样式属性，但通过指定的样式会重写， ， ，和属性。For cells in this column, the styles specified through the property override the styles specified through the property, but are overridden by the styles specified through the , , , and properties. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的单元格样式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性设置的各个列的内容的对齐方式。The following code example uses the property to set the content alignment of various columns. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewContentAlignment#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewContentAlignment/CS/changecolumnalignment.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewContentAlignment#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewContentAlignment/VB/changecolumnalignment.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int DisplayIndex { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 相对于当前所显示各列，获取或设置列的显示顺序。

span.span: Gets or sets the display order of the column relative to the currently displayed columns.

value.span: 从零开始的列位置（如同在关联 中的显示）；如果带区未包含在控件内，则为 -1。

span.span: The zero-based position of the column as it is displayed in the associated , or -1 if the band is not contained within a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与不同属性，属性对应于列的当前位置，显示的用户界面 (UI)。Unlike the property, the property corresponds to the current position of the column as displayed by the user interface (UI). 默认情况下，每个列的设置为数字递增的顺序，这反映了已添加的顺序。By default, each column's is set to numbers of increasing order, which reflects the order in which they were added. 属性值不会影响值。The property value does not affect the value. 若要确定基于其可见性或其他状态的列的显示位置，请使用， ，或方法类。To determine the display position of a column based on its visibility or other state, use the , , or method of the class. 在控件中的每个列具有一个唯一值。Every column in the control has a unique value. 值从 0 开始，并且未跳过任何值的情况下继续按数字顺序。The values start with 0 and proceed in numerical order without skipping any values. 当你更改列，值的其他列将更改以反映新的顺序值。When you change the value for a column, the values for other columns are changed to reflect the new order. 如果列具有一个关联控制，设置此属性将导致控件重绘自己。If the column has an associated control, setting this property will cause the control to redraw itself. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性要交换的第一个和最后一个列的可视位置。The following code example uses the property to swap the visual position of the first and last columns. 请注意，插入发生之前。Note that insertions occur before the . 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#170](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CPP/DataGridViewColumnDemo.cpp#170)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#170](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CS/DataGridViewColumnDemo.cs#170)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#170](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/VB/datagridviewcolumndemo.vb#170)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Disposed As EventHandler

summary.span: 释放 时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the is disposed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`DataGridViewColumn1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridViewColumn1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#370](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#370)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#370](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#370)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int DividerWidth { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置列分隔符的宽度（以像素为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the width, in pixels, of the column divider.

value.span: 分隔符（该列的右边距）的宽度（以像素为单位）。

span.span: The thickness, in pixels, of the divider (the column's right margin).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可用于提供冻结的列和可滚动的列之间的可视边界。This property is useful to provide a visual boundary between frozen columns and columns that can scroll. 额外的边缘是当前的列中的一部分，但是它将采用的关联的前景色。The extra edge is part of the current column, although it will take on the foreground color of the associated . 额外的边缘不会扩展用户可双击自动调整列的大小的区域。The extra edge does not extend the area in which users can double-click to automatically resize a column. 若要调整列的大小，用户必须双击分隔线和相邻的列之间的边界。To resize a column, the user must double-click on the boundary between the divider and the adjacent column. ## Examples 下面的代码示例在第三列后添加一个垂直边缘。The following code example adds a vertical edge after the third column. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#110](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CPP/DataGridViewColumnDemo.cpp#110)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#110](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CS/DataGridViewColumnDemo.cs#110)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#110](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/VB/datagridviewcolumndemo.vb#110)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property float FillWeight { float get(); void set(float value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，表示当该列处于填充模式时，相对于控件中处于填充模式的其他列的宽度。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that represents the width of the column when it is in fill mode relative to the widths of other fill-mode columns in the control.

value.span: ，表示当该列处于填充模式时，相对于控件中处于填充模式的其他列的宽度。

span.span: A representing the width of the column when it is in fill mode relative to the widths of other fill-mode columns.

value.span: 默认值为 100。

span.span: The default is 100.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性值是，以便控件中的所有可见列完全填充可用显示区域的水平宽度，以及在该模式下的其他列调整的列。When the property value is , the column is resized along with other columns in that mode so that all visible columns in the control exactly fill the horizontal width of the available display area. 控件中的所有填充模式列都划分可用空间按比例由其属性值。All fill-mode columns in the control divide the available space in proportions determined by their property values. 有关列填充模式的详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的列填充模式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/column-fill-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about column fill mode, see [Column Fill Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/column-fill-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 最大的总和中的所有列的值控件为 65535。The maximum sum of values for all columns in a control is 65535. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性。The following code example illustrates the use of this property. 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供[如何： 设置 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的大小调整模式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-set-the-sizing-modes-of-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Set the Sizing Modes of the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-set-the-sizing-modes-of-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSizingScenarios#30](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSizingScenarios/CS/sizingscenarios.cs#30)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSizingScenarios#30](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSizingScenarios/vb/sizingscenarios.vb#30)]

exception.span: 设置此属性时，指定的值小于或等于 0。

span.span: The specified value when setting this property is less than or equal to 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 列冻结后，也被冻结其左侧 （或右到左的语言中与其右侧） 的所有列。When a column is frozen, all the columns to its left (or to its right in right-to-left languages) are frozen as well. 冻结和解冻列形成两个组。The frozen and unfrozen columns form two groups. 如果对列重新定位启用了设置属性`true`，用户不能将列从一个组拖至其他。If column repositioning is enabled by setting the property to `true`, the user cannot drag a column from one group to the other. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性，它是到几乎完全相同属性类。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property, which is nearly identical to the property of the class. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. Public Overridable Function GetPreferredWidth (autoSizeColumnMode As DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode, fixedHeight As Boolean) As Integer
public: virtual int GetPreferredWidth(System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode autoSizeColumnMode, bool fixedHeight);

param.name: autoSizeColumnMode
param.span: 一个 值，该值指定自动调整大小模式。

span.span: A value that specifies an automatic sizing mode.

param.name: fixedHeight
param.span: 如果根据当前行高计算列宽度，则为 ；如果根据可变行高计算列宽度，则为 。

span.span: to calculate the width of the column based on the current row heights; to calculate the width with the expectation that the row heights will be adjusted.

summary.span: 根据指定条件计算列的理想宽度。

span.span: Calculates the ideal width of the column based on the specified criteria.

returns.span: 该列的理想宽度（以像素为单位）。

span.span: The ideal width, in pixels, of the column.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性由基于内容的自动调整大小功能使用的控件来确定某一列的理想宽度。This property is used by the content-based automatic sizing feature of the control to determine the ideal width of a column. A`fixedHeight`参数值的`false`计算列的宽度基于将会获得理想的单元格高度宽度比率的计算的行高。A `fixedHeight` parameter value of `false` calculates the column width based on calculated row heights that will achieve ideal cell height-to-width ratios. 对于换行为多行的单元格内容，必须具有的单元格样式属性值。For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a property value of . 有关自动调整大小的详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中调整选项](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about automatic sizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

span.span: is , , or .
is not a valid value.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell ^ HeaderCell { System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置表示列标题的 。

span.span: Gets or sets the that represents the column header.

value.span: ，表示列的标题单元格。

span.span: A that represents the header cell for the column.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 列的标题通常用于显示列标签。The header of a column is typically used to display a column label. 具体取决于的当前值和属性，用户还可以单击列标题以进行排序，或选择的列。Depending on the current values of the and properties, users can also click the column header to sort or select the column. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性可以更改列标题样式和内容。The following code example uses the property to change column header style and contents. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#150](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CPP/DataGridViewColumnDemo.cpp#150)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#150](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CS/DataGridViewColumnDemo.cs#150)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#150](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/VB/datagridviewcolumndemo.vb#150)]

value.span: 具有所需文本的 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当列具有与其关联的标题单元格时，此属性很有用。This property is useful only when the column has an associated header cell. 有关更多信息，请参见 属性。For more information, see the property. > [!NOTE] > 行没有相应标头文本属性。There is no corresponding header text property for rows. 若要在行标题中显示标签，你必须处理事件和绘画您自己的标签时为-1。To display labels in row headers, you must handle the event and paint your own labels when is -1. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性可以更改列标题中的文本。The following code example uses the property to change the text in the column header. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#160](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CPP/DataGridViewColumnDemo.cpp#160)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#160](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CS/DataGridViewColumnDemo.cs#160)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#160](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/VB/datagridviewcolumndemo.vb#160)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property InheritedAutoSizeMode As DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode

summary.span: 获取对该列有效的缩放模式。

span.span: Gets the sizing mode in effect for the column.

value.span: 作用于该列的 值。

span.span: The value in effect for the column.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值确定列的自动调整大小行为属性，它是值相同的除外的所有值的属性，这指示值是否从继承属性改为。The automatic sizing behavior of the column is determined by the value of the property, which is the same as the value of the property for all values except , which indicates that the value is inherited from the property instead. 当属性值是，以便控件中的所有可见列完全填充可用显示区域的水平宽度，以及在该模式下的其他列调整的列。When the property value is , the column is resized along with other columns in that mode so that all visible columns in the control exactly fill the horizontal width of the available display area. 控件中的所有填充模式列都划分可用空间按比例由其属性值。All fill-mode columns in the control divide the available space in proportions determined by their property values. 有关列填充模式的详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的列填充模式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/column-fill-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about column fill mode, see [Column Fill Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/column-fill-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 当属性设置为以外的任何其他值，该列将管理其宽度，以便其单元格的值完全显示会不经剪辑。When the property is set to any other value except , the column will manage its width so that its cell values are fully displayed without clipping. 在基于内容的大小调整模式下，大小调整单元格内容更改时，或者会发生，一旦启用，每当更改行高。In content-based sizing modes, size adjustments occur whenever cell contents change or, if is enabled, whenever row heights change. 某些基于内容的大小调整模式，可以限制对当前显示的行大小调整，以提高性能。Some content-based sizing modes let you limit the size adjustment to the currently displayed rows in order to increase performance. 只有具有列属性值`true`调整大小时，更改列的可见性不会导致进行调整大小时发生。Only columns with a property value of `true` are resized, and changing the visibility of a column does not cause resizing to occur. 此外，在列设置为自动调整大小，则用户不能调整鼠标列宽度。Additionally, when columns are set to automatically resize, the user cannot adjust the column widths with the mouse. 若要以编程方式调整列宽，使用控件的或方法或设置列属性。To adjust column widths programmatically, use the control's or methods or set the column property. 有关基于内容的自动调整大小的详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中调整选项](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about content-based automatic sizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

summary.span: 获取当前应用于该列的单元格样式。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可用于确定哪些单元格样式应用于列而不考虑任何还会应用到单元格的行样式中的所有单元格。This property is useful to determine which cell styles are applied to all cells in a column regardless of any row styles that are also applied to the cells. 列属性继承其属性值从和属性。The column property inherits its values from the and the property. 有关单元格样式继承的详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的单元格样式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about cell style inheritance, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

value.span: 如果该列连接到数据源，则为 ；否则为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果它是数据绑定的一部分列将绑定到数据源。A column becomes bound to a data source if it is part of a data-bound . 列可以成为数据绑定的一部分如果自动创建列时属性设置为`true`，或者，如果列的时列手动添加到设置属性。A column can become part of a data-bound if the column is automatically created when the property is set to `true`, or if the column's property is set when the column is manually added to the .

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTriState Resizable { get; set; }
Public Overrides Property Resizable As DataGridViewTriState
public: virtual property System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewTriState Resizable { System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewTriState get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewTriState value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，指示该列的大小是否可调。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the column is resizable.

value.span: 值之一。

span.span: One of the values.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性是，用户将不能手动调整列宽。If the property is , the user will not be able to manually adjust the column width. 默认情况下，属性值根据属性值。By default, the property value is based on the property value. 如果显式设置到或，但是，控件的值被忽略。If you explicitly set to or , however, the control value is ignored. 设置到若要还原值继承行为。Set to to restore the value-inheritance behavior. 因为还原值继承，属性将永远不会返回值，除非列尚未添加到控件。Because restores the value inheritance, the property will never return a value unless the column has not been added to a control. 如果你需要确定是否的列的属性值将继承，请检查其属性。If you need to determine whether the property value of a column is inherited, check its property. 如果属性值包含标志，不继承属性值。If the property value includes the flag, the property value is not inherited. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用此属性以修复第三个列的大小，使用户无法更改列的宽度。The following code example uses this property to fix the size of the third column so that the user cannot change the column width. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MouseBasedResizing#12](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MouseBasedResizing/CPP/mousesizing.cpp#12)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MouseBasedResizing#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MouseBasedResizing/CS/mousesizing.cs#12)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MouseBasedResizing#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MouseBasedResizing/VB/mousesizing.vb#12)]

value.span: ，指定根据列中单元格的值对行进行排序的条件。

span.span: A that specifies the criteria used to order the rows based on the cell values in a column.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当控件使用的列进行排序属性值，排序标志符号自动显示在列标题。When a control is sorted using a column with a property value of , a sorting glyph is automatically displayed in the column header. 从.NET Framework 4.6 开始，排序标志符号调整的系统 DPI 设置根据 app.config 文件包含以下条目：Starting in the .NET Framework 4.6, the sorting glyph is resized according to the system DPI settings when the app.config file contains the following entry: ``` ``` 当使用具有的列进行排序控件属性值，必须通过自己显示排序标志符号属性。When the control is sorted using a column with a property value of , you must display the sorting glyph yourself through the property. 默认排序模式是。The default sort mode of a is . 其他列类型的默认排序模式是。The default sort mode for other column types is . 值不会阻止你对列进行排序以编程方式，尽管其他限制也适用。The value does not prevent you from sorting a column programmatically, although other restrictions may apply. 有关更多信息，请参见 方法。For more information, see the method. A属性值将不会阻止事件发生，但它将阻止标头单击时其更改其外观。A property value of will not prevent the event from occurring, but it will prevent the header from changing its appearance when it is clicked. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. span.span: The text to display as a ToolTip for the column.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当鼠标指针停留在列标题上时，将显示该列的工具提示。The column's ToolTip displays when the mouse pointer rests on the column header. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置列的工具提示。The following code example shows how to set a column's ToolTip. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大的代码示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger code example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性来隐藏某一列从视图中保留列的同时。Use this property to hide a column from view while keeping the column in the . 若要完全删除某一列，请使用方法。To completely remove a column, use the method. 若要隐藏某一列绑定到数据源，以设置此属性时自动生成事件处理程序。To hide a column that is automatically generated when binding to a data source, set this property in a event handler. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性，它是到几乎完全相同属性类。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property, which is nearly identical to the property of the class. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类概述。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class overview.
